title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-8.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-8.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

Sections 383-8.2 through
383-8.8
of this Subpart specify the
minimum requirements for the operation of a land disposal facility. Any person
who maintains or operates an underground mined repository must also comply with
the requirements of section
383-8.9
of this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
